document_data.mainbody:
lackstar Lane was a small alley that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Blackstar Lane connected Snail Street with Gut Alley in Waterdeeps Dock Ward, branching due west from Snail Street and merging with Gut Alley a few buildings south of Leeras Alley. Both Three Daggers Alley and Dust Alley connected to the south side of Blackstar Lane.
The Blackstar Inn was located at the intersection of Blackstar Lane and Gut Alley.
